content: **cozy know your worth knit cocoon cardigan pattern by marly bird** discover the joy of knitting with the know your worth knit cocoon cardigan pattern designed by marly bird embrace the comfort of this easy-to-make size-inclusive garment perfect for adventurous beginners and experienced knitters alike **yarn ** sirdar jewelspun or similar aran yarn 1 needles appropriate needles for a gauge of your choosing suggested sizes provided notions stitch markers tapestry needle buttons if desired for closure skill level adventurous beginner to intermediate whether you re knitting for yourself gifting to a loved one or selling your crafts the know your worth knit cocoon cardigan is a pattern that will bring satisfaction and style learn more about this pattern here get the pattern on etsy here affiliate link to my etsy store http //shrsl com/4i0mo 1 https //shrsl com/4g29l
